name: I'm taking your heart, Cadi!
description:
Tony wants to globalize the PEP program in order to maintain societal balance. Your task is to surveil Tony and uncover the truth of PEP: will you carry out your mission? Or unexpectedly fall in love?

I'm taking your heart, Cadi! is a parody visual novel made for the USYD's GDSC game jam 2022. 6 music tracks, over 20 unique sprites and images, and close to 400 lines of dialogue, written and crafted over the span of 2 days.  

Instructions:

  • Press spacebar to progress through the story.
  • Up or down keys to alternate between dialogue options.
  • Your decisions influence the endings! Keep track of the love/spite progress bars.
  • If you enjoyed the game try out the other ending! 

Credits:

Joseph Ovelgonne - Main Developer
Miguel Benatiro - Script Writer, Music Composition, Developer
Kaitlyn Truong - Graphics, Developer

Sound Effects: www.peaceloveproductions.com

Be sure to try the other ending :D
Thanks for playing!
